CSSGrid-auto-columns.summary: The grid-auto-columns CSS property specifies the size of an implicitly-created grid column grid tracks or pattern of tracks.

remarks.para: If a grid item is positioned into a column that is not explicitly sized by {{cssxref("grid-template-columns")}}, implicit grid tracks are created to hold it. This can happen either by explicitly positioning into a column that is out of range, or by the auto-placement algorithm creating additional columns.
